label: Add Active Medication
description: Ability to add a new active medication to a patient record outside the medication ordering process

label: Discontinue Active Medication
description: Ability to mark an active medication as discontinued as the patient no longer takes it

label: Edit Active Medication
description: Ability to change an attribute of a medication
note: This change might be implemented by discontinuing the current medication and adding a new one

label: Read Active Medication
description: Read access to patient medication list.

label: Read Admin Screen
description: Read access to view user administration screen

label: Add Allergy
description: Ability to add a new allergy to the patients list of allergies

label: Edit Allergy
description: Ability to edit an existing entry (e.g.: changing the severity of the reaction)
example: Changing the severity of the reaction

label: Mark Allergy Entered in Error
description: Ability to mark an entry as entered in error if the entry was incorrectly entered in the patient record

label: Read Allergy
description: Read access to operations on allergies

label: Read Clinical Reminder
description: Read access to view clinical reminders created in CPRS

label: Read Community Health Summary
description: Read access to view community health summaries. Community health summaries are documents such as Continuity of Care Documents (CCDs) coming from external providers.

label: Read Document
description: Ability to view a variety of documents such as lab reports, radiology reports and progress notes all in one applet

label: Add Encounter Context
description: Ability to establish an encounter context (provider, location, date, and time)

label: Read Encounter Context
description: Ability to view the current encounter context

label: Add Encounter
description: Ability to create an encounter form and add items such as diagnosis, procedures performed and visit type to support 3rd party billing and workload credit documentation

label: Edit Encounter
description: Ability to edit a previously created encounter form

label: Add Consult Order
description: Ability to create a new consult order, which could include creating an order to be signed by an authorized user

label: Complete Consult Order
description: Ability to complete a consult order which includes associating a consult with a note for completion

label: Discontinue Order
description: Ability to discontinue a signed consult order that has not been acted upon by the fulfillment activity
note: A user can only discontinue their own orders

label: Edit Consult Order
description: Ability to edit an unsigned consult order, which could include creating an order to be signed by an authorized user

label: Review Consult Order Results
description: Ability to complete the review results task and end the activity
note: For use if the ordering provider is unavailable

label: Schedule Consult Order
description: Ability to schedule a consult order

label: Sign Consult Order
description: Ability to sign an order for transmission to the fulfillment activity

label: Triage Consult Order
description: Ability to triage a consult order

label: Add Coordination Request
description: Ability to create a new request

label: Respond to Coordination Request
description: Ability to respond to a request that has been tasked to the user

label: Edit Coordination Request
description: Ability to edit a request that is in a draft state, or that has been returned to the user

label: Add Immunization
description: Ability to add a new immunization, both administered or historical to a patient record

label: Eie Immunization
description: Ability to mark an immunization as entered in error, which removes it from viewing

label: Read Immunization
description: Read access to a patients immunizations list

label: Add Lab Order
description: Ability to create a new lab order, which could include creating an order to be signed by an authorized user

label: Discontinue Lab Order
description: Ability to discontinue a signed lab order that has not been acted upon by the fulfillment activity
note: A user can only discontinue their own orders

label: Edit Lab Order
description: Ability to edit an unsigned lab order, which could include creating an order to be signed by an authorized user

label: Enable Lab Order Collect Option Other
description: Ability to have an "other" option on the lab collection picklist

label: Follow-up Incomplete Lab Order
description: Ability to follow-up an incomplete lab order

label: Sign Lab Order
description: Ability to sign an order for transmission to the fulfillment activity

label: Track Lab Order
description: Ability to track a lab order

label: Add Med Order
description: Ability to create a new med order, which could include creating an order to be signed by an authorized user

label: Discontinue Med Order
description: Ability to discontinue a signed med order that has not been acted upon by the fulfillment activity
note: A user can only discontinue their own orders

label: Edit Med Order
description: Ability to edit an unsigned med order, which could include creating an order to be signed by an authorized user

label: Sign Med Order
description: Ability to sign an order for transmission to the fulfillment activity

label: Read Medication Review
description: Ability to see a patients medications including inpatient, outpatient, and clinic order medications in a timeline view

label: Add Non Va Medication
description: Ability to add a new active non VA medication to a patient record outside the medication ordering process

label: Edit Non Va Medication
description: Ability to change an attribute of a non VA medication (e.g.: dosage or frequency taken: Note: this change might be implemented by discontinuing the current medication and adding a new one
note: This change might be implemented by discontinuing the current medication and adding a new one

label: Add Note
description: Ability to create a new progress note to document a patient encounter, which could include creating a note to be signed by an authorized user

label: Add Note Addendum
description: Ability to create a new progress note addendum to document a patient encounter, which could include creating a note addendum to be signed by an authorized user

label: Cosign Note
description: Ability to be a cosigner on a note such as an atttending physician cosigning a residents note

label: Delete Note
description: Ability to delete an unsigned note that the originating user drafted

label: Edit Note
description: Ability to edit an unsigned progress note, which could include editing a note to be signed by an authorized user

label: Edit Note Addendum
description: Ability to edit an unsigned progress note addendum, which could include editing a note addendum to be signed by an authorized user

label: Retract Note
description: Ability to mark a signed note as to reflect a status of retracted

label: Sign Note
description: Ability to sign a progress note making it an official part of the patient record

label: Sign Note Addendum
description: Ability to sign a progress note addendum making it an official part of the patient record

label: Read Order
description: Ability to view a patients order history

label: Add Patient History
description: Ability to record a patients histories such as family or social history

label: Edit Patient History
description: Ability to edit a patients histories such as family or social history

label: Mark Patient History Entered in Error
description: Ability to mark an entry in a patients history as entered in error

label: Read Patient History
description: Read access to a patients problem list

label: Edit Military History
description: Ability to edit a patient's military history

label: Read Military History
description: Ability to read an entry in a patients history

label: Clear Patient Sync
description: Ability to clear a patient's sync status

label: Load Patient Sync
description: Ability to start a patient sync

label: Add Condition Problem
description: Ability to add a new problem to the patients problem list

label: Edit Condition Problem
description: Ability to edit a problem on the patients problem list such as changing the severity of the problem

label: Read Condition Problem
description: Read access to a patients problem list

label: Remove Condition Problem
description: Ability to mark a patients problem list entry as removed

label: Read Patient Record
description: Ability to search for and select an individual patient record

label: Add Radiology Order
description: Ability to create a new rad order, which could include creating an order to be signed by an authorized user

label: Cosign Radiology Order
description: Ability to cosign a radiology order.

label: Discontinue Radiology Order
description: Ability to discontinue a signed rad order that has not been acted upon by the fulfillment activity
note: A user can only discontinue their own orders

label: Edit Radiology Order
description: Ability to edit an unsigned rad order, which could include creating an order to be signed by an authorized user

label: Sign Radiology Order
description: Ability to sign an order for transmission to the fulfillment activity

label: Access Stack Graph
description: Ability to utilize the stacked graph applet to view patient information over time

label: Add Task
description: Ability to create a new task and assign it to yourself or another user

label: Cancel Task
description: Ability to cancel own task
note: A user can only cancel their own tasks

label: Edit Task
description: Ability to edit own task
note: A user can only edit their own tasks

label: Read Task
description: Ability to view a tasks related to a patient

label: Add User Permission Set
description: Ability to add to user's permissions

label: Edit Own Permissions
description: Ability to edit permissions related to one self
note: Allows a user to change permissions without fear of being able to edit them back. A user can't add or remove this from themself

label: Edit User Permission Set
description: Ability to edit a user's permissions

label: Read User Permission Set
description: Ability to read user's permissions

label: Remove User Permission Set
description: Ability to remove a user's permissions

label: Add User Preferences
description: Ability to add a user's preferences

label: Edit User Preferences
description: Ability to edit a user's preferences

label: Delete User Preferences
description: Ability to delete a user's preferences

label: Read User Preferences
description: Ability to read a user's preferences

label: Add Vital
description: Ability to add a new vital signs

label: Mark Vital Entered in Error
description: Ability to mark one or more vital signs recorded at the same time that were entered in error

label: Read Vital
description: Read access to a patients vital signs

label: Read Vista Health Summary
description: Ability to view health summaries created in CPRS

label: Create Clinical Object
description: Allows users to create clinical objects
note: This is for Activity Management Only

label: Delete Clinical Object
description: Allows users to delete clinical objects
note: This is for Activity Management Only

label: Edit Clinical Object
description: Allows users to edit clinical objects
note: This is for Activity Management Only

label: Read Clinical Object
description: Allows users to read clinical objects
note: This is for Activity Management Only

label: eHMP General Access
description: Ability to perform application specific actions as an authenticated eHMP user such as set user preferences

label: Read Operational Data
description: Ability to read operational data

label: Read Orderable
description: Ability to read a list of potential orderables

label: Manage Enterprise Orderable
description: Ability to add/edit/delete enterprise orderable definitions

label: Read Enterprise Orderable
description: Ability to read enterprise orderable definitions

label: Read Concept Relationships
description: Ability to read Concept Relationships

label: Read CDS Work-product
description: Ability to read CDS work product

label: Manage CDS Work-product
description: Ability to add/edit/delete CDS work products

label: Read CDS Work-product Subscription
description: Ability to read CDS work product subscriptions

label: Manage CDS Work-product Subscription
description: Ability to add/edit/delete CDS work product subscriptions

label: Read CDS Work-product Inbox
description: Ability to read CDS work product inbox

label: Manage CDS Schedule
description: Ability to create/edit/delete CDS Schedule definitions

label: Read CDS Schedule
description: Ability to read CDS Schedule definitions

label: Read CDS Job
description: Ability to read CDS job definitions

label: Manage CDS Job
description: Ability to add/edit/delete CDS job definitions

label: Manage CDS Patient List Criteria
description: Ability to add/create criteria defining CDS Patient Lists

label: Read CDS Patient List Criteria
description: Ability to read criteria defining CDS Patient Lists

label: Manage CDS Patient List Definition
description: Ability to add/create CDS Patient Lists definitions

label: Read CDS Patient List Definition
description: Ability to read CDS Patient Lists definitions

label: Manage CDS Patient List
description: Ability to add/edit/delete CDS Patient List instances

label: Read CDS Patient List
description: Ability to read CDS Patient List instances

label: Manage CDS Metric Dashboard
description: Ability to create/delete CDS Metrics Dashboards

label: Read CDS Metric Dashboard
description: Ability to read CDS Metrics Dashboards

label: Manage CDS Metric Definition
description: Ability to create/delete CDS Metrics definitions

label: Read CDS Metric Definition
description: Ability to read CDS Metrics definitions

label: Manage CDS Metric Group
description: Ability to create/edit/delete CDS Metrics groups

label: Read CDS Metric Group
description: Ability to read CDS Metrics groups

label: Read CDS Metric
description: Ability to read CDS Metrics

label: Read CDS Intent
description: Ability to read CDS Intents used by CDS reasoning

label: Manage CDS Intent
description: Ability to add/edit/delete a new CDS Intent to facilitate access to CDS reasoning

label: Manage CDS Engine
description: Ability to add/edit/delete CDS Engines from the library

label: Read CDS Engine
description: Ability to read the CDS Engines in the library

label: Read FHIR
description: Ability to read FHIR resources for a specific patient

label: Edit FHIR Composition Request
description: Ability to edit FHIR Composition resources

label: Delete FHIR Composition Request
description: Ability to delete FHIR Composition resources

label: Add Quick Order
description: Ability to add a new Quick Order definition

label: Delete Quick Order
description: Ability to delete an existing Quick Order definition

label: Read Quick Order
description: Ability to read an existing Quick Order definition

label: Edit Quick Order
description: Ability to edit an existing Quick Order definition

label: Add Order Set
description: Ability to define new order set definitions

label: Delete Order Set
description: Ability to delete order set definitions

label: Read Order Set
description: Ability to read order set definitions

label: Edit Order Set
description: Ability to edit order set definitions

label: Add Favorite
description: Ability to mark orderables as Favorites

label: Delete Favorite
description: Ability to unmark orderables as Favorites

label: Read Favorite
description: Ability to read Favorite orderables

label: Read VLER Transition of Care
description: Ability to read the VLER transition of care

label: Read Messages from Communication System
description: Ability to read the messages given by the communications system
